author: Kalle Pokkinen (Guest)
title: Love it!
text: Hi, awesome stuff about SAP E-Commerce (just love the fact that someone bothers pointing out that it is not quite up to modern standards :)). I wrote a few times on SDN around this topic http://www.sdn.sap.com/irj/scn/weblogs?blog=/pub/wlg/17967 let me know if still working in the E-Commerce space and I can send you the Jetty, SVN and Eclipse Helios ported versions ;)
